mapper.select: SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.tmdb_vote_cnt, a.poster_path FROM (SELECT * FROM movie WHERE tmdb_vote_cnt >= 100 AND popularity >= 30 AND release_date >= '00/01/01' ORDER BY tmdb_vote_sum DESC) A WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.tmdb_vote_cnt, a.poster_path FROM (SELECT * FROM movie WHERE tmdb_vote_cnt >= 100 AND popularity >= 30 AND release_date <= '90/01/01' ORDER BY tmdb_vote_sum DESC) A WHERE rownum <= 20
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
SELECT * FROM actor WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
SELECT * FROM director WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
(SELECT ACTOR.NAME FROM ACTOR) UNION (SELECT DIRECTOR.NAME FROM DIRECTOR) UNION (SELECT MOVIE.TITLE FROM MOVIE)
SELECT DISTINCT MOVIE.* FROM MOVIE INNER JOIN MOVIE_ACTOR ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = MOVIE_ACTOR.MOVIE_ID INNER JOIN ACTOR ON MOVIE_ACTOR.ACTOR_ID = ACTOR.ACTOR_ID WHERE ACTOR.ACTOR_ID = #{actor_id}

SELECT DISTINCT MOVIE.* FROM MOVIE INNER JOIN MOVIE_DIRECTOR ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = MOVIE_DIRECTOR.MOVIE_ID INNER JOIN DIRECTOR ON MOVIE_DIRECTOR.DIRECTOR_ID = DIRECTOR.DIRECTOR_ID WHERE DIRECTOR.DIRECTOR_ID = #{dir_id}
SELECT movie_id, title, release_date, round(tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, overview, poster_path, backdrop_path, country, runtime, original_title FROM movie WHERE movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM movie_genre mg JOIN genre g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE mg.movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM director d JOIN movie_director md ON d.director_id = md.director_id WHERE md.movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM actor a join movie_actor ma ON a.actor_id = ma.actor_id where ma.movie_id = #{movie_id} AND a.profile_path IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM movie m join movie_images mi ON m.movie_id = mi.movie_id where m.movie_id = #{movie_id}

SELECT c.movie_id, c.member_id, c.content, COALESCE(r.rating, 0) AS rating, c.likes, c.state, c.regdate FROM comments c LEFT OUTER JOIN rating r ON r.movie_id = c.movie_id AND r.member_id = c.member_id WHERE c.movie_id = #{movie_id} ORDER BY likes DESC
mapper.insert: insert into comments values (#{movie_id}, #{member_id}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{state})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE movie_id = #{movie_id} AND member_id = #{member_id}
